More Videos 2:56 Peterson Archives: Neighbor Karen Servas talks about Scott and Laci Pause 3:08 Peterson Archives: Sharon Rocha discusses Amber Frey, lethal injection 2:22 Peterson Archives: Sharon Rocha discusses movies, abusive relationships 3:40 Peterson Archives: Neighbor Karen Servas says she knew Laci 'wasn't coming back' 7:10 Predictions for Week 3 of Stanislaus District high school football 0:45 Anglers flock to 'combat fishing' zone in Oroville 1:24 Mother and daughter react after victim impact statement 1:31 Officer involved in shooting describes encounter with knife-wielding man 0:14 Road sign's message surprises driver on Carpenter Road in Modesto 2:44 Witness says Pass police used stun gun on pregnant woman Video Link copy Embed Code copy

Peterson Archives: Sharon Rocha on speaking out for Laci With the 2017 summer broadcast of the documentary series, "The murder of Laci Peterson", The Modesto Bee is re-releasing selected 2007 interviews conducted by reporter Garth Stapley with some key figures in the case. In this video, Laci Peterson's mom, Sharon Rocha, talks about the importance of speaking out for her daughter. In this video, Laci Peterson's mom, Sharon Rocha, talks about the importance of speaking out for her daughter. (Bee File)

title: Scott and Laci Peterson: The saga that TV won't let die

twitter.title: Scott and Laci Peterson: The saga that TV won't let die
twitter.description: Renewed interest in the story of Scott and Laci Peterson results in several television channels revisiting Modesto's most notorious double-murder, a 15-year-old case that captivated people across the United States and beyond.
